name: AIA_Classification_CreateInstance
sail_code:
recordType!AIA Classification Instance(
  recordType!AIA Classification Instance.outcomes: rule!AIA_ClassificationInstanceOutcome_Initialize(
    documentId: ri!ClassificationResult.classifiedItem,
    modelVersionId: ri!modelVersionId,
    classification: ri!ClassificationResult.type,
    isSplit: false,
    initiator: loggedInUser()
  ),
  recordType!AIA Classification Instance.confidence: ri!ClassificationResult.confidenceScore,
  recordType!AIA Classification Instance.modelVersionId: ri!modelVersionId,
  recordType!AIA Classification Instance.createdBy: ri!initiator,
  recordType!AIA Classification Instance.createdOn: now(),
  recordType!AIA Classification Instance.documentId: ri!ClassificationResult.classifiedItem,
  recordType!AIA Classification Instance.pageCount: rule!AIA_GetPageCount(
    document: ri!documentId
  )
)
